archive/f77-interface-source.commit_message:
Revert "Remove f77 interface source files (#319)"

This reverts commit ddd4dafb99ae736e30cd3517728e65af9f5adbc0.
Remove f77 interface source files (#319)

Feature/persistent benchmarking (#296)

Sets up the make target `benchmark`, which will allow the user to run
all the benchmarks at once.
- Adds a macro to add benchmarks to the target `benchmark`
- Sets up output file structure for Caliper files to be saved to.

Adds documentation
- how to build documentation
- how to use SPOT
- how to enable profiling of examples and benchmarks

Adds Adiak, a library to collect metadata
- Used to collect TPL versions, compiler versions, and various other
build data

---------

Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Cody J. Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Fix memory leak in SUNMemoryHelpers (#314)

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>
Fix memory leak in Kepler example (#315)

Group CMake Options in index and Show index in left navigation pane (#310)

* Move common extensions to shared file
* Updates index to group cmake options under "CMake options" category
* Update left navigation pane to include index link

Feature/sprkstep (#290)

Add a new time-stepping module, SPRKStep, to ARKODE providing explicit symplectic partitioned Runge-Kutta methods for separable Hamiltonian systems. 

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Feature/corona pipeline tpls (#276)

Adds another GitLab CI pipeline job for Corona testing Sundials with
Ginkgo, Kokkos, and Kokkos-kernels with Rocm 5.2.3.

Notes
- The Ginkgo dense tests are commented out.
- The sunlinsol kokkosdense test occasionally fails due to the error
being just outside the tolerance.

---------

Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Cody J. Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Bugfix - Creating pcg parallel directory (#297)

There was an error where even when MPI was enabled the
`../examples/sunlinsol/pcg/parallel` directory was not being built
because it was not being added as a subdirectory in
`../examples/sunlinsol/CMakeLists.txt`.

---------

Co-authored-by: shahbajsohal <sohal.shahbaj4@gmail.com>
Co-authored-by: Balos, Cody, J <balos1@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Relaxation Runge-Kutta Methods (#298)

Add support for explicit, implicit, and IMEX relaxation Runge-Kutta
methods in ERKStep and ARKStep

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Bugfix: Constraint Temporary Vector Usage (#303)

Fix a potential bug when constraint handling is enabled and
`GetEstLocalErrors`is called in ARKODE

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>

tstop-copy (#292)

Changed default 'tstop' behavior of ARKODE and CVODE(S) to copy the
internal solution instead of performing interpolation.

---------

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Fix SUNDIALS_SUPERLUMT_THREAD_TYPE definition (#294)

Assimulo looks for this define
unfortunately the syntax was wrong

Signed-off-by: Julien Schueller <schueller@phimeca.com>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Documentation Fixes (#295)

Fix some documentation errors and typos (addresses issue #280)
Fix uninitialized value warning with debug logging (#286)

Add missing break (#287)

Missing break when selecting ARKODE second order IMEX method

Feature/sundialsfileopen (#284)

Minor updates to two F2003 utility routines so that they can properly
handle `stdout` and `stderr`.

While this is not tested in our current codes, this will be included in
examples later this summer (I tested it already).

---------

Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Added codes related to kokkos benchmark program, and new CVODE+Kokkos… (#283)

Add a Kokkos version of the `advection_reaction_3D` benchmark program
Add a CVODE Kokkos example program showing how to map our 1D NVector "views" to logically multi-dimensional views for use in Kokkos kernels
---------
Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

RAJA Benchmark fixes (#282)

This PR fixes multiple errors in the RAJA-based advection_reaction_3D
benchmark program, and moves the corresponding RAJA-specific source
codes into a subfolder, in anticipation of an accompanying kokkos
version.

Add second order imex method (#278)

Add a default second order IMEX method (ARK2 from Giraldo, Kelly, and
Constantinescu 2013)

---------

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Remove oneMKL getrs_batch workaround (#271)

Workaround for bug in`getrs_batch` is no longer needed

---------

Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Update diffusion benchmark README and docs (#270)

Co-authored-by: Daniel R. Reynolds <reynolds@smu.edu>

Update test/answers submodule (#272)

Update `test/answers` to point to `main`

Corona CI pipeline (#259)

Adds CI support for Sundials testing on Corona with HIP (and TPLs).

---------

Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Cody J. Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Bugfix: check tstop first (#322)

Fixed a bug in ARKODE, CVODE, CVODES, IDA, and IDAS where the stop time
may not be cleared when using normal mode if the requested output time
is the same as the stop time. Additionally, with ARKODE, CVODE, and
CVODES an unnecessary call to
interpolate the solution at the stop time may occur in this case.

Bugfix: Support ARK2-3-1-2 in ARKStepSetTableNum (#346)

Update ARKStepSetTableNum to recognize ARK2-3-1-2 as a valid ARK pair.

Update ARKODE methods docs (#344)

1. Adds missing implicit tables to the ARKODE constants docs

develop.commit_message:
Bugfix: stop time and output time reached in same step (#349)

Fixes #339: A regression was introduced by the stop time bug fix in
v6.6.1 causing integrators to return at the stop time rather than the
requested output time if the stop time was reached in the same step in
which the output time was passed.

Also fixes a missing check in ARKODE to interpolate (or not) the
solution at the stop time.

Bugfix: Support ARK2-3-1-2 in ARKStepSetTableNum (#346)

Update ARKStepSetTableNum to recognize ARK2-3-1-2 as a valid ARK pair.

Update ARKODE methods docs (#344)

1. Adds missing implicit tables to the ARKODE constants docs
2. Makes formatting of constants consistent in ARKODE docs
3. Groups implicit tables by order

---------

Co-authored-by: David Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>

Fix missing soversion on some SUNLinSol and SUNNonlinSol targets

Signed-off-by: Julien Schueller <schueller@phimeca.com>

Fix time complexity issue for sparse matrix (#257)

Fixes part of #253 by avoiding nested loops that take `O(M*N)` operations.

Also fixes #256.

---------

Signed-off-by: phannebohm <phannebohm@fh-bielefeld.de>
Co-authored-by: Cody Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Add scripts for comparing benchmark and example timings against release timings and a notebook using Thicket to visualize data

Bugfix: stop time and output time reached in same step (#349)

Fixes #339: A regression was introduced by the stop time bug fix in
v6.6.1 causing integrators to return at the stop time rather than the
requested output time if the stop time was reached in the same step in
which the output time was passed.

Also fixes a missing check in ARKODE to interpolate (or not) the
solution at the stop time.

Bugfix: stop time and output time reached in same step (#349)

Fixes #339: A regression was introduced by the stop time bug fix in
v6.6.1 causing integrators to return at the stop time rather than the
requested output time if the stop time was reached in the same step in
which the output time was passed.

Also fixes a missing check in ARKODE to interpolate (or not) the
solution at the stop time.

Bugfix: check tstop first (#322)

Fixed a bug in ARKODE, CVODE, CVODES, IDA, and IDAS where the stop time
may not be cleared when using normal mode if the requested output time
is the same as the stop time. Additionally, with ARKODE, CVODE, and
CVODES an unnecessary call to
interpolate the solution at the stop time may occur in this case.

Feature/persistent benchmarking (#296)

Sets up the make target `benchmark`, which will allow the user to run
all the benchmarks at once.
- Adds a macro to add benchmarks to the target `benchmark`
- Sets up output file structure for Caliper files to be saved to.

Adds documentation
- how to build documentation
- how to use SPOT
- how to enable profiling of examples and benchmarks

Adds Adiak, a library to collect metadata
- Used to collect TPL versions, compiler versions, and various other
build data

---------

Co-authored-by: David J. Gardner <gardner48@llnl.gov>
Co-authored-by: Cody J. Balos <balos1@llnl.gov>

Bugfix: check tstop first (#322)

Fixed a bug in ARKODE, CVODE, CVODES, IDA, and IDAS where the stop time
may not be cleared when using normal mode if the requested output time
is the same as the stop time. Additionally, with ARKODE, CVODE, and
CVODES an unnecessary call to
interpolate the solution at the stop time may occur in this case.

all the benchmarks at once.

Adds documentation

build data

may not be cleared when using normal mode if the requested output time
